Stacked bar chart of proportions for each body system class by arm and maximum severity

aestacked.Rd

Stacked bar chart of proportions for each body system class by arm and maximum severity

Usage

aestacked(
  data,
  arm_levels,
  body_system_class = "body_system_class",
  severity = "severity",
  id = "id",
  arm = "arm",
  arm_names = NULL,
  severity_levels = NULL,
  severity_colours = NULL,
  save_image_path = NULL
)

Arguments

data

data frame with adverse_event, body_system_class, severity, id and arm columns

arm_levels

vector of factor levels in arm variable

body_system_class

name of body_system_class column

severity

name of severity column

id

name of id column

arm

name of arm column

arm_names

vector of names for each arm in arm variable

severity_levels

vector of level of severity in ascending order if severity is not ordered factor

severity_colours

vector of colours for level of severity in ascending order

save_image_path

file path to save stacked bar chart plot as image

Value

stacked bar chart presenting the proportions of participants with each event by arm and by maximum severity

Examples

df2$aebodsys <- as.factor(df2$aebodsys)
df2$severity <- ordered(df2$severity, c("Mild", "Moderate", "Severe"))
aestacked(df2, body_system_class="aebodsys", arm_levels=c("Intervention","Placebo"), severity_levels=c("Mild", "Moderate", "Severe"))
